name: B Street Deli
short_title: Rustic deli + wine bar for sandwiches, boards and canelés
address: 88 Bermondsey St, London SE1 3UB, United Kingdom
summary: B Street Deli is a rustic-style deli and wine bar on Bermondsey Street serving coffee, pastries, sandwiches, salads, and grazing boards with a strong wine selection. It’s a popular all-day stop for casual lunches and relaxed evening drinks, with reviews frequently calling out the charcuterie/cheese boards, canelés and good-value wine.
what_diners_love: Charcuterie and cheese boards for sharing
Canelés often described as a standout
Reliable breakfast baps, sandwiches and salads
Works well as an all-day deli café that shifts into wine-bar mode
atmosphere_experience: A relaxed rustic deli vibe by day that transitions into a casual wine bar in the evening—ideal for grab-and-go, quick lunches, or low-key drinks.
good_to_know: Good value for the area based on typical spend
Suitable for quick stops as well as casual grazing and wine
top_tip: If you’re visiting for the first time, go for a board + a glass of Malbec, and don’t miss the canelés.
